channel.title: Serve on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Serve on Stats On the T

item.title: Best ATP Servers and Returners of 2017
item.description: Who was the best server in 2017? Who was the best receiver? Which players were the most improved servers and receivers? This post reviews the standout performances of male players in 2017 using serve/return Elo ratings.

item.title: Is Fatigue Cumulative?
item.description: Fighting off fatigue in any Grand Slam match is a challenge. Does this get even harder after multiple matches?
